headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: param_type
parameters.description: How parameters are passed in. Enum values: RECOMMENDED , CUSTOMIZED . Default value: CUSTOMIZED . RECOMMENDED : Use the parameters predicted by the system. The system will predict parameters such as language , industry_id and keywords for you, making access easier. CUSTOMIZED : Customize the relevant parameters. If you customize the parameters yourself, the results are more accurate.

parameters.name: language Conditional
parameters.description: Language。Enum values: EN , JA , RU , VI . This field is required when param_type = CUSTOMIZED .

parameters.name: industry_id
parameters.description: Industry ID. For details, see Appendix - Industries .

parameters.name: keywords Conditional
parameters.description: Keywords. This field is required when param_type = CUSTOMIZED .

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of texts to be generated, in the range of [1, 20]. The default value is 10.

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: The response message. For example, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: The response code. For details, see Appendix-Return Codes .

fields.name: generate_id Conditional
fields.description: The ID of the generated text.

fields.name: industry_id Conditional
fields.description: The ID of the industry that has been specified or estimated.

fields.name: language Conditional
fields.description: The language that has been specified or estimated. Enum values: EN , JA , RU , VI .

fields.name: texts Conditional
fields.description: The text that is automatically generated.

fields.name: Access-Token
fields.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

other_tables.title: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

fields.name: generated_text_id
fields.description: The ID of the generated text.

fields.name: selected_titles
fields.description: The text that is used in ads. It can be blank if no text is selected.

fields.name: final_title
fields.description: The final title caption used in your ad. If you used the generated text from creative/smart_text/generate/ , then please enter the same text as in generated_title

fields.name: message
fields.description: The response message. For example, see Appendix - Return Codes .

fields.name: code
fields.description: The response code. For details, see Appendix-Return Codes .
